name: Jazzy the Frog Goes Home for the Holidays
name_original: Jazzy the Frog Goes Home for the Holidays
description:
It's Christmas time in frog land. Do frogs know Christ? eh who cares.

I was making this for a secret santa but guess who dropped their hard drive christmas eve. Luckily I eventually got it recovered but the whole thing was pretty expensive so if anyone wants to tip or buy one of my games I'd be very grateful.

It's possible I spelled christmas wrong somewhere in the game. That's not me doing cute animal speak I just cant spell.
